title.narrative: 5. HEALTH SYSTEM STRENGTHENING FOR MNCAH

description.narrative: By 2020, the health system has capacity to produce and use quality data to develop result-, equity- and gender-based plans and budgets, manage health procurement appropriately and respond effectively to emergencies., which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Child Health, Hiv Prevention, Immunization, Maternal And Newborn Health, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes, Treatment And Care Of Children Living With Hiv. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, the health system has capacity to produce and use quality data to develop result-, equity- and gender-based plans and budgets, manage health procurement appropriately and respond effectively to emergencies.

description.narrative: UNICEF reinforced quality free health care, results-based management, equity-based performance monitoring and development of regional and district health plans. The main bottlenecks were the reduced access to basic health and nutrition services in numerous health facilities due to insecurity and strikes and protests of health sector union | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: % of targeted health regions with development plan using results-based, gender-sensitive and equity-oriented planning and budgeting
Number of policy and strategy documents developed or revised that integrate gender, equity and emergency management
Number of household receiving at least one LLINs
Number of children aged 6 to 59 months vaccinated against measles
% of health districts performing performance monitoring at health district level and community level in the 5 targeted regions (Boucle du Mouhoun, North, Center-North, East, Sahel)
Effective vaccine management (EVM) composite country score
Country had no stock-out of DTP/Penta, Polio (OPV and IPV) and Tetanus Toxoid vaccines at district level
